FuncDef:
The traffic-policy ipv6-address-rule match mask command configures MF traffic classification based on the mask of IPv6 address.
The undo traffic-policy ipv6-address-rule match mask command configures MF traffic classification based on the mask of IPv6 prefix.
By default, MF traffic classification based on the mask of IPv6 prefix is configured.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The traffic-policy ipv6-address-rule match mask command configures MF traffic classification based on the mask of IPv6 address.
In VS mode, this command applies only to the admin VSand cannot be configured in other VSs. This command takes effect on all VSs.
